lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In a May 1 study, he wrote: "One point in VW's favour is that its extraordinary policy of not hedging forward has meant that it will have less far to go in adjusting to current DM/Dollar rates than the other German manufacturers who were to a lesser or greater extent protected up to 1986."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Analyst Joseph Rooney with brokers James Capel in London, noted the Japanese drive was coming at a time when the whole European market was expected to contract slightly.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: On the plus side for the industry, which is West Germany's biggest foreign exchange earner, the analysts are confident the technical superiority and innovative qualities of the luxury producers will help them maintain a strong market profile.
